New Records: Tyler O’Neill hit his 30th homer of the season in just 100 games played
Key Match Events: Tyler O’Neill crushed a three-run homer in the bottom of the 10th as the Red Sox won in a walk-off over the Orioles, 5-3
Pre-Game Insights: Manager Alex Cora emphasized the importance of winning games to keep postseason hopes alive
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Alex Cora expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win
Tyler O’Neill said it’s day-by-day and they can’t focus on other teams right now, they got to focus on themselves
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Red Sox head to New York for a four-game series
The Red Sox are hoping to carry some momentum into the series
Red Sox relievers have 19 blown saves since the All-Star break, the most in baseball
